title: Digital Nomad Gear: Best Portable Keyboards for Travel
description: Typing on the go? We review compact, foldable, and wireless keyboards that fit in your backpack.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Form Factors

60% or 65% layouts are the sweet spot. They remove the number pad and F-row but keep the essentials.

Low Profile

Keyboards like the NuPhy Air75 are thin and light, perfect for sliding into a tablet sleeve.
